| HistoryText             = The Queen's Guard are [[Shiklah (Earth-616)|Shiklah]]'s personal guard. They also doubled as her lovers, due to the neglect of Shiklah's husband, [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]].

When Shiklah set out to invade [[Manhattan]], she trapped Deadpool in a room with the guard, so they could chop him into pieces to keep him subdued until the conflict was over; however, Deadpool managed to escape, killing two of the guards in the process.{{r|Deadpool Vol 6 28}}
